solution_line_template: Winwin paid ${winnings} x {tax_percentage} = $<<{winnings}*{tax_percentage}={tax_paid}>>{tax_paid} for the tax.
So, she has ${winnings} - ${tax_paid} = <<{winnings}-{tax_paid}={after_tax}>>{after_tax} after paying the tax.
Therefore, Winwin was able to take home ${after_tax} - ${processing_fee} = $<<{after_tax}-{processing_fee}={take_home}>>{take_home} after she paid for the processing fee.
